desc: R & J Framing and Plaques is an established framing and plaque company successfully manufacturing superior quality university certificate & degree frames & plaques for over 40 years. Photo frames, custom framing and graduation gifts.

layout.text: Get your university degree frame, framed certificate or plaque from the certificate framing specialists. We partner with top universities around the country to produce perfect degree and qualification frames and plaques that will last a lifetime.
